summary: The Nuclear Ecosystem Drone Defense Act (NEDD Act) aims to grant the Secretary of Energy exemptions from certain restrictions concerning unmanned aircraft systems (drones) from foreign entities. It amends sections of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 and the Bob Stump National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2003, expanding the Secretary's authority regarding drone usage, classified tracking, and the protection of nuclear facilities and assets from drones. The Act also aims at other purposes such as the establishment of a specialized committee to oversee drone-related operations.
